definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: Don't say that there is no true love, don't let others mistook you seen it all.
sentences.chinese: 别说这世间没有真爱，不要让别人误以为你阅人无数。

sentences.english: To succeed in the world we must look foolish but be wise.
sentences.chinese: 要在人世间取得成功，我们心须大智若愚。

sentences.english: There is a limit to the amount of creative talent available in the world.
sentences.chinese: 人世间的创造力是有一定限度的。

sentences.english: The world is really foxy woman?
sentences.chinese: 世间也真有如狐般的女子吗？

sentences.english: I'm a kid of God, living in this blue-sky universe.
sentences.chinese: 我是上帝的孩子我生活在这个虚浮的世间。

sentences.english: The hostility between the weak and the strong, the existence of inequality in our world.
sentences.chinese: 弱者与强者的敌对，世间所存在的不平等性。

sentences.english: But the world has become a repeated dust, the dust has settled that moment, Jesus Christ reincarnation.
sentences.chinese: 不过成为世间一屡尘埃，尘埃落定那刻，万世轮回。

sentences.english: Now, I am half snake, half woman-the worst of all possible worlds.
sentences.chinese: 如今我半蛇半女，世间最痛苦的，莫过于此。

sentences.english: Innocence are the most valuable things in the human world, we rectifiable is it.
sentences.chinese: 纯真是人世间最可贵的东西，我们可求的就是它。

sentences.english: All the beautiful sentiments in the world weigh less than a single action.
sentences.chinese: 世间所有美丽的情感抵不过一次可爱的行动。

sentences.english: Fortune reigns in gifts of the world, not in lineament of nature .
sentences.chinese: 命运之神是人世间恩惠的主宰，不能支配自然的相貌。

sentences.english: There is no law and order and motorcycle gangs terrorize the country.
sentences.chinese: 世间没有法律和秩序，只有飞车党横行霸道。

sentences.english: He lives a turbulent life and has experienced many difficulties in the world.
sentences.chinese: 他一生坎坷，经历过人世间许多苦难。

sentences.english: We all — in the end — die in medias res. In the middle of a story. Of many stories.
sentences.chinese: 世间有许多故事，而我们最终都会在故事的一半死去。

sentences.english: God is not only the Creator but also the One who rules over the cosmos.
sentences.chinese: 神不仅是造物者，更是造就了世间万物的一切规则。

definition: great wide world/marvelously diverse world/(Buddhism) cosmos (abbr. for 三千大千世界[san1 qian1 da4 qian1 shi4 jie4])
the world/this world/the world of the living
affairs of life/things of the world
variable/changeable/fickle/impermanence (Sanskrit: anitya)/ghost taking away the soul after death/to pass away/to die
this life/to lose face/to be disgraced
mundane world (in religious context)/this mortal coil
